fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Fervor: If you have 1 HP at the start of a phase, draw 2 satcheled cards.
- Vigor: When you lose 2 HP or more in a single phase, gain a random satcheled attacking card.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rush: Lose 1 HP. Draw a non-special attacking card of your choice. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Pound: Lose 2HP. Gain a random special attacking card. [1 use, UOR2]
- Challenge: Pick a player. If you currently have more attacking cards than they have defense, Heal! at the end of the phase. [3 uses, 2 CD]
